fullText: The show feels more like a concept album with choreography than a fully realized musical, despite the genuine passion that Mr. Sting brings to his material.
dtliExcerpt: The show feels more like a concept album with choreography than a fully realized musical, despite the genuine passion that Mr. Sting brings to his material.
